description:
Romeo and Juliet (Except Juliet knows chemistry, and it's backwards kind of)

Run time, around 5 minutes or so, it's a very short experience.

A short game made for the #lowrezjam 2021. 

Controls

Up, down, left and right to "prepare ingredients".

Spacebar or enter to proceed.

M to mute. 

Credits

Based on Romeo and Juliet by Will Shakespeare. 

Colour Palette - Resurrect 64 by Kerrie Lake - https://lospec.com/palette-list/resurrect-64

Music - Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky - Romeo & Juliet (This is that music you hear all the time in TV and adverts!)

Sound Effects - Sidearm Studios Ultimate Sound Effects bundle - https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle

Used the Dialogic Plugin for Godot - https://coppolaemilio.itch.io/dialogic

Font used - Little Conquest by Jack Oatley- https://jackoatley.itch.io/ikkle-font-pack
